name: White City Dating Sim
description:
May 6th, 2016. You remember it, don't you? It's time to wake up. Step outside and see what today brings. There are so many different people out there to meet, but what if you had a chance encounter today with someone who will change your life? Trust yourself, have no fear, and I know you will find a new beginning today.

Seek out the objects of affection.

White City Dating Sim. Produced by Basement Level.

CONTROLS:

  • Click or Spacebar: Proceed
  • Enter: Select
  • Arrow Keys: Change Selection
  • Escape: Pause Menu
A Visual Novel.
Written by James Cooper
Music by RAP/RAP/RAP [CC BY-NC-SA 3.0]
Featuring the voices of Alexandra Sadler & Eric Gerstein

Released May 6th, 2017
